column4: ok... i hate to ask again, but does anybody know how to set the default sound device? because all my sounds go to a device that doesnt have speakers hooked up
does anybody even get my messages?\
then a little acknowledgement of my existence would be kind
the best advice I have is to read the alsa doc

hmm
it should be able to self recognize
